10-24-2024: - Added looping telegraph for Seven {AbilityIcon|Ability=Static Charge|Size=20} Static Charge ability

- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Lightning Ball|Size=20} Lightning Ball cooldown increased from 23s to 26s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Lightning Ball|Size=20} Lightning Ball radius reduced from 4m to 3.5m
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Lightning Ball|Size=20} Lightning Ball T2 slow reduced from 40% to 35%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Storm Cloud|Size=20} Storm Cloud expand time reduced from 3s to 2s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Storm Cloud|Size=20} Storm Cloud range increased from 25m to 30m

- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Lightning Ball|Size=20} Lightning Ball T3 increased from +1m to +2m

- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Static Charge|Size=20} Static Charge radius reduced from 6m to 5m
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Static Charge|Size=20} Static Charge can now be alternate-casted on self (does not stun you)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Static Charge|Size=20} Static Charge now respects line of sight
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Lightning Ball|Size=20} Lightning Ball T3 now also gives +1m Radius
